data.what_is: Take Your Business To The Next Level With Marketing and Process Automation. Whether your company markets personality assessments or parenting coaching, fishing courses or art pieces, or anything in-between, you've probably wasted countless hours having to grapple with getting information from one of your systems to another just to keep your business operational. We can work with you to identify the day-to-day tasks you shouldn't need to perform manually and the tedious processes you have to micromanage and determine how to digitally automate and optimize those processes so that you can put your focus on growing your business instead of spending time simply maintaining it.
data.product_description: Take Your Business To The Next Level With Marketing and Process Automation. Whether your company markets personality assessments or parenting coaching, fishing courses or art pieces, or anything in-between, you've probably wasted countless hours having to grapple with getting information from one of your systems to another just to keep your business operational. We can work with you to identify the day-to-day tasks you shouldn't need to perform manually and the tedious processes you have to micromanage and determine how to digitally automate and optimize those processes so that you can put your focus on growing your business instead of spending time simply maintaining it.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Automize?
It is so very easy to use and it allows me to automate my business processes in the organization I work with so that we can complete our jobs easier. I really enjoy how easy it is to use.

What do you dislike about Automize?
It could have a cooler design to me especially to the website style. Personally, I am visual and would enjoy more of a fun website to look at in comparison to what they have now.

What problems is Automize solving and how is that benefiting you?
They are solving making business processes easier to tackle and improve the automization of computer software which benefits me because we all need a faster way to get things done.

review_question_answers.answer: They are solving making business processes easier to tackle and improve the automization of computer software which benefits me because we all need a faster way to get things done.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Automize?
It is an amazing task scheduling and automation software. It offers easy ways to maintain and implement solutions that is needed for success of a business/ product.
Easy to use with no programing requirement.

What do you dislike about Automize?
As of now there is not much that I have been disliking about automize. The process can be made more smooth and user friendly that will help users to work at ease.

What problems is Automize solving and how is that benefiting you?
It serves various purpose for me:
1) Enables me to schedule mails
2)Automate FTP
3)schedule downloads
4) automize & helps to executes tasks/ applications/ other software programs

initial_reviews.review_title: A strong foundation for lasting change
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Automize?
Flexibility and agility in relation to supplier choices, and stable solution.

What do you dislike about Automize?
more support resources for users and knowledge articles.

What problems is Automize solving and how is that benefiting you?
They provide consultants with exactly the IT specialist knowledge that makes the difference in our business.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Automize?
review_question_answers.answer: Flexibility and agility in relation to supplier choices, and stable solution.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Automize?
review_question_answers.answer: more support resources for users and knowledge articles.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Automize solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: They provide consultants with exactly the IT specialist knowledge that makes the difference in our business.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Automize?
Flexibility in terms of usage as well as good integration with our company resources.

What do you dislike about Automize?
Knowledge and documentation are required to customize which is not available or hard to find.

What problems is Automize solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insightful consultancy for our business and helpful solutions delivered.
